info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:48PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Deer Lodge, southeastern Granite, Silver Bow and southeastern Powell Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 448 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles north of Ovando to near Deer Lodge to 10 miles southwest of West Valley. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Butte, Anaconda, Silver Bow, Walkerville, Galen, Divide, Warm Springs, Gregson Hot Springs, Garrison, West Valley, Finn, Brock Creek, Racetrack, Helmville, Opportunity, Ramsay, Janney, Elliston and Nissler. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 165 and 229. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 0 and 26. Highway 200 E between mile markers 51 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
